missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the Rebel stockpile.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You depart the skiff at a warehouse on the outskirts of Mos Eisley. You meet a hooded Gotal, who ignores your introduction and hands you a barrel. When you try to peek inside the package he slaps your hand. “No questions,” he bleats. “Just work.” He points to a stack of similar barrels, then to his YV-666 outside. Before long, the crates are loaded and you depart.

As you approach a ruined temple you note several mercenaries stationed throughout the Dosha jungle.

eventActions.otherTarget: a Rebel figure carrying a spice barrel

eventActions.tbText:
Upon landing, a pair of Gamorreans emerge from a stone temple, confer with the Gotal, then help haul the barrels inside.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Place 5 neutral mission tokens on each of the red highlighted spaces.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent spice barrels.
{-} A figure can spend 2 movement points to retrieve a spice barrel without using an action. A figure can carry only 1 spice barrel.
{-} When a figure carrying a spice barrel suffers 3 or more {H}, that figure drops that spice barrel in his space.

Ah, Kar Ranth, you've arrived.” A richly adorned human welcomes you professionally, but not warmly. “Shall we get to it?” Kar and the buyer examine the shipment while you and the mercenaries eye each other up in silence.

“Very good, Kar. I'll take the lot.”

“At the agreed price?”

“No.” A single blaster bolt fells your ward before you can reach your weapons. Immediately, two men come rushing in, grabbing some spice barrels.

eventActions.customText:
{A} Move 4 toward the Spicer's stockpile.
{A} Open an adjacent door.
{A} Move 4 toward the Spicer's stockpile.
{A} Open an adjacent door.
{-} When a Spice Runner carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the spicer's stockpile, the Empire claims that spice barrel. Then that Spice Runner is removed from the map and set aside.

{A} Move 4 toward the Spicer's stockpile.
{A} Open an adjacent door.
{A} Move 4 toward the Spicer's stockpile.
{A} Open an adjacent door.
{-} When a Spice Runner carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the spicer's stockpile, the Empire claims that spice barrel. Then that Spice Runner is removed from the map and set aside.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Deploy 1 Imperial Officer on both spice barrel piles. These are the Spice Runners.
{-} Spice Runners cannot be defeated. When a Spice Runner would be defeated, remove the figure from the map and set it aside.
{-} Each Spice Runner interrupts to retrieve a spice barrel.
There is some commotion outside. The spicers have set up a crate to hold the spice barrels.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The spicers have placed a large crate for the spice barrels here.

{-} When a Spice Runner carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the spicer's stockpile, the Empire claims that spice barrel. Then that Spice Runner is removed from the map and set aside.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the Spicer's stockpile.
{-} When a Spice Runner carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the spicer's stockpile, the Empire claims that spice barrel. Then that Spice Runner is removed from the map and set aside.
"We gotta hurry!", your pilot's voice coms in over your comlinks. "Grab whatever you can and let's get outta here!" The engines of your shuttle flare as it descends, waiting for you.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The spicers have placed a large crate for the spice barrels here.

{-} When a Rebel figure carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the Rebel stockpile, the Rebels claim that spice barrel.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the Rebel stockpile.
{-} When a Rebel figure carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the Rebel stockpile, the Rebels claim that spice barrel.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 6. At that point, if the Rebels have claimed more spice barrels than the Empire, they win the mission.

eventActions.shortText: Claim more spice barrels than the Empire before the end of Round 6.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent spice barrels.
{-} A figure can spend 2 movement points to retrieve a spice barrel without using an action. A figure can carry only 1 spice barrel.
{-} When a figure carrying a spice barrel suffers 3 or more {H}, that figure drops that spice barrel in his space.
{-} Spice Runners cannot be defeated. When a Spice Runner would be defeated, remove the figure from the map and set it aside.
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the Spicer's stockpile.
{-} When a Spice Runner carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the spicer's stockpile, the Empire claims that spice barrel. Then that Spice Runner is removed from the map and set aside.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the Rebel stockpile.
{-} When a Rebel figure carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the Rebel stockpile, the Rebels claim that spice barrel.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 6. At that point, if the Rebels have claimed more spice barrels than the Empire, they win the mission.

events.eventText:
The cargo door isn't even closed when the shuttle departs. Leaving Dosha behind, you treat your wounds and return to Tatooine.

Jabba treats you to a lavish feast upon your return. For the moment, you've earned his graces. The Hutt knows that while spice is valuable, loyalty is priceless.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.
{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission cards "Trophy Hunting" and "Turf War" into play.

eventActions.mainText: Are there three or more spice barrels on the Spicer's stockpile?

events.eventText:
Mercenaries continue to pour from the jungle, and you're forced to leave Jabba’s cargo behind. Unable to secure the majority of the spoils, you retreat with your lives to face the Hutt’s disappointment.

Jabba is displeased, but reasonable. You survived the ambush, and your skills have earned a second chance. Knowing that the Hutt lord’s favor is all that protects your families, you prepare for the next task.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission cards "Trophy Hunting" and "Turf War" into play.

eventActions.mainText: Are there three or more spice barrels on the Rebel stockpile?

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A rickety door leads out of the spicer's den.
A rickety door leads out of the spicer's den.

eventActions.mainText: Is the Spice Runner set aside?

events.eventText: End this activation immediately, without resolving any instructions.

eventActions.mainText: Is the Spice Runner set aside?

events.eventText: End this activation immediately, without resolving any instructions.

While the fight adds to the ruin of the temple, both sides have been careful to protect the spice. You're not sure exactly how much it’s worth, but with your families' lives in the balance, you can't afford to upset Jabba.

You hear blaster fire from the direction of your shuttle. “You've got more company!” your pilot's voice calls over the comlink.

Just outside, a man emerges from the Jungle, with a ferocious beast. He blasts the chain from the Nexu’s neck, and the beast bounds towards you, teeth gnashing.
"More of'em," your pilot warns. "Get what you need, then we need to leave!" The engines flare, the shuttle ready to depart at a moment's notice.

eventActions.mainText: Have the Rebels claimed more spice barrels than the Empire?

events.eventText:
More runners rush in to make off with your spice.

{-} Place 1 Spice Runner whose figure is set aside on or adjacent to each unretrieved spice barrel (maximum 2). 
{-} Each of the Spice Runners just placed interrupts to retrieve a spice barrel.
The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
Because there are three or more spice barrels on the Rebel stockpile, the heroes gain 25 credits per hero.

mapEntities.mainText: A rickety door leads out of the spicer's den.
A rickety door leads out of the spicer's den.

The spicers have placed a large crate for the spice barrels here.

{-} When a Spice Runner carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the spicer's stockpile, the Empire claims that spice barrel. Then that Spice Runner is removed from the map and set aside.

Your shuttle is waiting here, cargo door open and engines running, ready to depart whenever you are ready.

{-} When a Rebel figure carrying a spice barrel moves on or adjacent to the Rebel stockpile, the Rebels claim that spice barrel.
